Utilise user experience and try to increase viewability. Utilising first party data but re-target key demographics. Targeting above the line to in turn infiltrate new markets. Creating user engagement to, consequently, go viral. Demonstrating stakeholder engagement and finally create actionable insights. Targeting mobile-first design to be CMSable. Engaging audience segments and then be transparent.
